info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 05 at 4:15AM EST until January 07 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Warren and Morris. In Pennsylvania, Northampton. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin into Saturday afternoon and reach a peak intensity into Saturday evening, with snowfall rates near 0.5 to 1 inch per hour possible. Some areas closer to I-78 may experience a mix of rain or sleet with the snow later Saturday evening. Total snowfall accumulations may near 10 to 12 inches across elevations above 1500 feet. Light snow may then linger through Sunday morning, however additional accumulations during the daytime period Sunday should be minimal. The snow will end by Sunday afternoon.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
